ItemType.name: Weigelt cannon
ItemType.attributes: alien, cabbageCorp, cabbageTwoSlots, energyHowitzer, illegal, majorItem
ItemType.description: Weigelt cannons are mysterious devices left throughout the galaxy by an unknown ancient race. No one knows how to make or repair them and they can only ever be fired once before they destroy themselves. Due to their only apparent use being to destroy stationary targets like stations, most governments have declared them illegal.
